name: Freshworks
description: Freshworks designs ridiculously easy-to-use software for businesses of all sizes, making it effortless for them to delight their employees and their customers. Affordable, quick to implement and designed for the end user, more than 50,000 companies worldwide use Freshworks software-as-a-service to enable a better customer experience (CX, CRM) and employee experience (ITSM, HRSM).
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: Freshworks empowers the people who power your business.
ShortDescription: Customer service, IT, and CRM software that’s powerful yet easy to use. Now supercharged with generative AI.

Highlights.name: Improved customer relationships
Highlights.description: Freshworks products can help you improve your customer relationships by providing a better customer service experience.

Highlights.name: AI-powered
Highlights.description: Freshworks products leverage artificial intelligence to automate tasks and provide insights, making your customer support and IT service management more efficient.

Highlights.name: Easy to use:
Highlights.description: Freshworks products are designed to be user-friendly, so you don't need to be a tech expert to get started.

enhanced_description: Freshworks provides ridiculously easy-to-use, affordable, and quick-to-implement software-as-a-service (SaaS) for businesses of all sizes. It focuses on improving both customer experience (CX, CRM) and employee experience (ITSM, HRSM) by offering a comprehensive suite of customer service, IT, and HR management solutions. The software is designed for the end-user and leverages AI-powered automation, including generative AI, to enhance efficiency, automate tasks, and provide actionable insights.
key_use_cases: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
competitive_advantages: Leverages generative AI for enhanced capabilities
roi_benefits: Increased efficiency in customer support and IT service management
